bibl.title: P. Berol. 21220 = Theognis, Elegiae I, 917-933.
bibl.note: P. Berol. Inv. 21220 [ed.: Herwig MAEHLER, Neue Hexameter-Fragmente auf Papyrus, ZPE 6 (1970) pp. 163-165 et pl. VII k] can be securely assigned to the Theognidea, lines 917-933, thus presenting us with our second Theognis fragment.
KOTANSKY Roy, P. Berol. 21220 = Theognis, Elegiae I, 917-933.
ZPE 96 (1993) pp. 1- 5 et pl. VIII a.
